attributes.description:
MOTUS NISSAN & RENAULT MENLYN offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

MOTUS MENLYN, where customers become friends
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 3 170.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 17 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
attributes.options: Cloth Trim, Power Steering, Steel wheels

attributes.description:
Superb Interior and Exterior Condition. 
Complete Motus 101 Quality Checks completed on every vehicle.
All vehicles are sold with a complete service history.
Finance options are available from our dealership.
Optional extended warranties and service plans are available. 
We assist with accessory fitments such as smash and grab, tracker etc.
Price excludes dealer on the road fees. 
Mileage might have changed since time of when ad was placed. Nationwide delivery service 
available on request.  Trade ins are welcome.

attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bedfordview.

attributes.description:
Here are some of what the team at Renault Pinetown offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged.
